name: Sisters (itch) (Omer Elbaz, Lyddar)
description:
An alien girl has been sent to earth so her older sister could get the crown. When she gets there, she finds that planet earth has been destroyed, and that evil monsters rule it. As she keeps exploring earth, her sister's ship got ruined while trying to send the monsters after her. After coming to terms, the sisters work together to collect the ruined ship's parts in order to fix it and return to their planet together.

art: Omer Elbaz
This game was developed as part of 2022nd Global Game Jam
